first_para: Darren Paul Johnson (born in 1966 in Southport, Lancashire) is an English politician and prominent member of the Green Party of England and Wales. He represents the Green Party in the London Assembly and was a Green councillor in the London Borough of Lewisham.

full.extract:
Darren Paul Johnson (born in 1966 in Southport, Lancashire) is an English politician and prominent member of the Green Party of England and Wales. He represents the Green Party in the London Assembly and was a Green councillor in the London Borough of Lewisham.
Johnson, who is openly gay, lives in Brockley, Lewisham, with his long-term partner and former borough councillor, Dean Walton.
full.title: Darren Johnson
